item.description: On this post I am going to show a comparison between the different optimization algorithms implemented till now in CTLearn, all of them applied to the same telescope and with the same configuration. item.description: In the past few weeks, I spent a lot of time learning how to visualize a 3D vector field interactively. item.title: Week 10: a wrapper is born
item.dc:creator: astrojansen
item.description: What I completed this week: Continued working on the signal to noise functions pull request to synphot Changed function names from howell_snr to ccd_snr and exptime_from_howell_snr to exptime_from_ccd_snr, which are more descriptive/informative The units returned by ccd_snr are now dimensionless Beg ...READ MORE...
